de.sevenfactory.argon

Class Argon

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sevenfactory.argon.Argon

  • public class Argon
extends Object
    Argon maintains a singleton instance that holds, persists and updates a user defined configuration object of any type.

    If debug mode is enabled, a notification is shown while the app is running in the foreground. This notification opens a configuration activity containing all valid fields of your configuration object. Valid fields are Strings and the primitive types int, float and long. Field names displayed in the configuration activity can be changed using the annotation Name.

    Leaving the configuration activity always triggers a process restart after which the updated configuration object is available. For consistency reasons, configuration updates during runtime using updateConfig(Object) will only be effective after a process restart.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static <T> Argon init(Application application,
                             Class<T> tClass,
                             T defaultConfig)
        Init Argon with a fallback configuration. This has to be done in Application.onCreate() to guarantee correct interpretation of lifecycle events.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the Type of your configuration Object
        Parameters:
        application - your application class
        tClass - the class of your configuration model Object
        defaultConfig - an instance of your configuration
        Returns:
        the newly created Argon instance that can be used to chain setters
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if Argon has already been initialized

      • updateConfig

        public static <T> void updateConfig(T config)
        Updates the singleton instance's configuration object. Changes will not be visible until the process is restarted to maintain consistency across your application.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the configuration object
        Parameters:
        config - the modified configuration object

      • getConfig

        public static <T> T getConfig()
        Getter for the configuration object. Please not that this will not return an updated object when called after updateConfig(Object) until the process is restarted.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the configuration object
        Returns:
        the current configuration object

      • setDebugModeEnabled

        public static void setDebugModeEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables debug mode. Default is disabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - shows debug notification and options activity if true

      • isDebugModeEnabled

        public static boolean isDebugModeEnabled()
        Getter for debug mode status.
        Returns:
        true if debug mode is enabled
